football.question: Who won the 2022 Ballon d'Or?
football.explanation: Karim Benzema won the 2022 Ballon d'Or after an exceptional season with Real Madrid.

football.question: Which team won the 2021 Premier League?
football.explanation: Manchester City won the 2020-21 Premier League title.

football.question: Who is the all-time top scorer in the Champions League?
football.explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo is the all-time leading scorer in Champions League history.

football.question: Which player has won the most World Cup titles?
football.explanation: Pele won three World Cup titles with Brazil (1958, 1962, 1970).

football.question: Who scored the fastest goal in Premier League history?
football.explanation: Shane Long scored after 7.69 seconds for Southampton against Watford in 2019.

tennis.question: Who has won the most Grand Slam singles titles in men's tennis?
tennis.explanation: Novak Djokovic holds the record for most Grand Slam singles titles in men's tennis.

tennis.question: Which tournament is played on clay courts?
tennis.explanation: The French Open (Roland Garros) is the only Grand Slam played on clay courts.

tennis.question: Who won the most consecutive Wimbledon titles?
tennis.explanation: Roger Federer won five consecutive Wimbledon titles from 2003 to 2007.
